actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army to remove Shooters' Island from lower Newark Bay to improve navigation.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army to remove Shooters' Island, located north of Staten Island, New York, at the mouth of Arthur Kill. Directs the Secretary to utilize such removed material for for fill and widening of Arthur Kill.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army to remove Shooters' Island from lower Newark Bay to improve navigation.
